definition: plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess
to wind around/to wrap round/to coil/tangle/to involve/to bother/to annoy

sentences.english: See ya tomorrow hey Frank can I borrow a couple of bucks from you?
sentences.chinese: 明天见了，嘿法兰克我能不能跟你借点盘缠用用？

sentences.english: He was found desperately trying to untangle several reels of film.
sentences.chinese: 他被撞见拼命想要解开几盘缠在一起的胶卷。

sentences.english: Face, send that person many travelling expenses again.
sentences.chinese: 临走，又送那人不少盘缠。

sentences.english: The sailor coiled the rope around the anchor.
sentences.chinese: 水手把绳子盘缠在锚上。

to possess nothing except bare necessities/to live a poor or frugal life
to go and take an imperial examination
private saved money of close family members
room charge in a hotel/accommodation expenses
